dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 899 IH: To terminate the Department of Education.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Massie (for himself, Mr. Amash, Mr. Biggs, Mr. Chaffetz, Mr. Gaetz, Mr. Jody B. Hice of Georgia, Mr. Jones, and Mr. Labrador) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Education and the Workforce

form.official-title: To terminate the Department of Education.

section.header: Termination of the Department of Education
section.text: The Department of Education shall terminate on December 31, 2018.
